content:
Craft an item of type: diamond_helmet
inventory=[{"type": "pumpkin_seeds", "quantity": 57, "index": 10}, {"type": "diamond", "quantity": 5, "index": 13}, {"type": "quartz_pillar", "quantity": 12, "index": 19}, {"type": "cake", "quantity": 1, "index": 20}, {"type": "birch_sapling", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "light_gray_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "magenta_wool", "quantity": 35, "index": 26}, {"type": "dragon_egg", "quantity": 39, "index": 29}, {"type": "green_terracotta", "quantity": 61, "index": 34}]

thought: To craft a diamond helmet, I need to place 3 diamonds along the top row of the crafting grid and 2 diamonds on the leftmost and center columns of the second row. I have 5 diamonds in my inventory, so I will move one diamond from slot 13 to slot 1, which is the first slot in the top row of the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Ok
